/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and concrete over the road. Cars of various colors are parked along the sides of the road, hinting at the busy nature of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
